name: The Inevitable
description:
This is a very short text adventure style game dealing with the inevitability of death and the ways in which lives connect. There are three characters to choose from, though to be able to put the full story together you must play all three.

(Warning: For those it may concern this game touches on the subject of death and this includes people of all age groups. It also touches on suicide. If you feel you cannot handle that I understand and this is probably not a game for you to play.)
